headline: US oil futures dip after API inventory shows unexpected build in crude stocks
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. crude oil futures fell slightly from post-settlement levels Wednesday after the American Petroleum Institute reported an unexpected build in weekly domestic crude inventories.

raw.headline: US oil futures dip after API inventory shows unexpected build in crude stocks
raw.summary: Investing.com -- U.S. crude oil futures fell slightly from post-settlement levels Wednesday after the American Petroleum Institute reported an unexpected build in weekly domestic crude inventories.

headline: BofA lifts Valero rating on heavy crude advantage but downgrade Phillips 66
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America upgraded Valero Energy to Buy from Neutral, saying the refiner stands to benefit most from an expected widening in the price gap between light and heavy crude over the next year.
